Public NotInheritable Class EventLogTraceListener Inherits TraceListener
public ref class EventLogTraceListener sealed : System::Diagnostics::TraceListener

summary.span: Provides a simple listener that directs tracing or debugging output to an .

span.span: Provides a simple listener that directs tracing or debugging output to an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实例可以添加到， ，或集合，以便从跟踪或调试到发送输出。An instance of this can be added to the , , or collections to send output from tracing or debugging to an . 可以在代码中添加实例或应用程序配置文件中指定它。You can add the instance in your code or specify it in the application configuration file. 若要添加对应于你的应用程序的名称的文件或 app.config 文件中的使用应用程序配置文件，编辑[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]项目。To add an using an application configuration file, edit the file that corresponds to the name of your application or the app.config file in a [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] project. 在此文件中，插入的元素类型。In this file, insert an element for a type. 以下示例将添加名为对象`myListener`到集合。The following example adds a object named `myListener` to the collection. `initializeData`参数指定要传递到事件日志源的名称构造函数。The `initializeData` parameter specifies the name of the event log source that is to be passed to the constructor. ``` ``` 有关如何在应用程序配置文件中添加跟踪侦听器的详细信息，请参阅或。For more information about how to add trace listeners in the application configuration file, see or . > [!NOTE] > 如果与关联的事件日志实例不存在，创建新的事件源。If the for the event log that is associated with the instance does not exist, a new event source is created. 若要在 Windows Vista、Windows XP Professional 或 Windows Server 2003 中创建事件源，您必须拥有管理特权。To create an event source in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional, or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges. > > 这一要求的原因是必须搜索所有事件日志，包括安全性，以确定事件源是否唯一。The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 在 Windows Vista 中，用户无权访问安全日志；因此将引发 。In Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a is thrown. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 此类提供属性来获取或设置接收跟踪或调试输出，在事件日志并属性，使其包含的名称。The class provides the property to get or set the event log that receives the tracing or debugging output, and the property to hold the name of the . 方法关闭事件日志，使它不再接收跟踪或调试输出。The method closes the event log so it no longer receives tracing or debugging output. 和方法向事件日志写入一条消息。The and methods write a message to the event log. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免出现大量的数据写入事件日志中，不会输出指定的可选跟踪数据属性。To avoid the possibility of writing large amounts of data to the event log, the does not output the optional trace data specified by the property. ## Examples 以下示例创建跟踪侦听器，它将输出发送到事件日志。The following example creates a trace listener that sends output to an event log. 首先，代码将创建一个新，它使用源`myEventLogSource`。First, the code creates a new that uses the source `myEventLogSource`. 下一步，`myTraceListener`添加到集合。Next, `myTraceListener` is added to the collection. 最后，该示例将发送到在输出行对象。Finally, the example sends a line of output to the object. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLogTraceListener Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLogTraceListener Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLogTraceListener Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLogTraceListener Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLogTraceListener Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLogTraceListener Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The methods are not intended to be called by application code. 方法调用， ，和类来输出跟踪数据。They are called by methods of the , , and classes to output trace data. 方法，例如方法适用于自动化的工具，但还可以附加其他对象，例如异常实例，对此跟踪。The method, like the method is intended for automated tools but also allows the attaching of additional objects, for example an exception instance, to the trace. `eventCache`和`source`参数用于确定是否应跟踪的事件。The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced. `id` 用于创建对象和等同于为属性。`id` is used to create an object and the is equated to an for the property. 写入到事件日志`data`对象，格式为字符串，使用方法。The is written to the event log with the `data` object, formatted as a string, using the method. > [!NOTE] > 最大值`id`参数为 65535。The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535. 如果`id`值指定为大于 65,535，将使用的最大值。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The methods are not intended to be called by application code. 方法调用， ，和类来输出跟踪数据。They are called by methods of the , , and classes to output trace data. 方法，例如方法适用于自动化的工具，但还可以附加其他对象，例如异常实例，对此跟踪。The method, like the method is intended for automated tools but also allows the attaching of additional objects, for example an exception instance, to the trace. `severity`并`id`参数的数据用于创建对象，从数据对象的数组写入到事件日志的数据。The `severity` and `id` parameter data is used to create an object, which is written to the event log with the data from the array of data objects. `eventCache`和`source`参数用于确定是否应跟踪的事件。The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced. `id` 用于创建对象和等同于为属性。`id` is used to create an object and the is equated to an for the property. 写入到事件日志`data`对象数组，格式为字符串数组时，使用方法。The is written to the event log with the `data` object array, formatted as a string array, using the method. > [!NOTE] > 最大值`id`参数为 65535。The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535. 如果`id`值指定为大于 65,535，将使用的最大值。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The methods are not intended to be called by application code. 这些方法调用的方法， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。These methods are called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data. 方法旨在与工具可以自动处理的跟踪事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如一个监视工具可以通知管理员，如果由特定源跟踪特定事件。For example a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. `eventCache`和`source`参数用于确定是否应跟踪的事件。The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced. `id` 用于创建对象和等同于为属性。`id` is used to create an object and the is equated to an for the property. 写入到事件日志`message`数据使用方法。The is written to the event log with the `message` data using the method. > [!NOTE] > 最大值`id`参数为 65535。The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535. 如果`id`值指定为大于 65,535，将使用的最大值。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The methods are not intended to be called by application code. 这些方法调用的方法， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。These methods are called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data. 方法旨在与工具可以自动处理的跟踪事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如一个监视工具可以通知管理员，如果由特定源跟踪特定事件。For example a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. `eventCache`和`source`参数用于确定是否应跟踪的事件。The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced. `id` 用于创建对象和等同于为属性。`id` is used to create an object and the is equated to an for the property. 写入到事件日志中，使用方法，并从获取消息`format`和`args`参数。The is written to the event log, using the method, with the message obtained from the `format` and `args` parameters. `args`对象数组转换为字符串使用方法，传递`format`字符串和`args`数组格式字符串设置为事件日志的消息。The `args` object array is converted to a string using the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array to format the string as the message for the event log. > [!NOTE] > 最大值`id`参数为 65535。The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535. 如果`id`值指定为大于 65,535，将使用的最大值。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.
